api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.subtitle: Manage your API keys for NSER integration
api_keys.key_name_note: Give this key a descriptive name
api_keys.required_for_api: Required when making API requests to the lookup endpoint
api_keys.confirm_rotate: Are you sure? The old API key will no longer work.
api_keys.confirm_revoke: Are you sure you want to revoke this key? This action cannot be undone.
api_keys.usage_1: Use your API key in the Authorization header: Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
api_keys.usage_2: Keep your API keys secure and never commit them to version control
api_keys.usage_3: Rotate keys periodically for enhanced security
api_keys.usage_4: Each key has rate limits to protect the service
api_keys.usage_5: Monitor the "Last Used" timestamp to identify unused keys

lookup.title: Exclusion Lookup
lookup.subtitle: Real-time exclusion status check
lookup.at_least_one_field: At least one search field is required
lookup.doc_1: Enter at least one identifier (phone number, national ID, or BST token)
lookup.doc_2: The system instantly checks against the exclusion register
lookup.doc_4: Results are cached for performance and compliance audit trails
lookup.doc_5: Lookup history is stored locally in your browser (not on our servers)

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.subtitle: Receive real-time exclusion notifications
webhooks.https_required: Must be a valid HTTPS URL
webhooks.delete_confirm: Delete this webhook? This action cannot be undone.
webhooks.test_event_sent: Test event sent! Check your webhook logs.
webhooks.doc_1: Webhooks are delivered via HTTP POST to your specified URL
webhooks.doc_2: Failed deliveries are retried up to 5 times with exponential backoff
webhooks.doc_3: Always respond with HTTP 200 to acknowledge receipt
webhooks.doc_4: Webhook payloads include a signature for verification
webhooks.doc_5: Test webhooks to verify your integration works correctly

compliance.title: Compliance Tracking
compliance.subtitle: Monitor your operational compliance score
compliance.requirement_1: Maintain a compliance score of at least 90% for unrestricted access
compliance.requirement_2: API response times must be under 200ms (P99)
compliance.requirement_3: Webhook delivery success rate must be at least 99%
compliance.requirement_4: Log all API calls and maintain audit trails for 12 months
compliance.requirement_5: Complete compliance checks are recommended quarterly

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.subtitle: Your operator performance metrics and analytics
statistics.no_metrics: No metrics available. Please try again later.
statistics.rate_limits_target: Rate Limits: 100 requests/second per API key

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: View and manage your profile information

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and integration preferences

simulator.title: API Simulator
simulator.subtitle: Test exclusion lookup integration before going live
simulator.fill_at_least_one: Please fill in at least one field
simulator.no_api_key_error: Error: No API key available. Please check your API keys.
simulator.no_api_key_message: No API key found. Enter one manually or check API key settings.
simulator.api_key_not_shared: Your API key is never stored or shared
simulator.replace_api_key: Replace YOUR_API_KEY with your actual key
simulator.guideline_4: Required fields: operator_id, and at least one of: phone_number, national_id, or bst_token
simulator.guideline_6: Rate limits apply based on your plan
simulator.guideline_7: All requests are logged for audit purposes
simulator.security_1: Store API keys in environment variables, never in code
simulator.security_2: Use backend proxy for browser-based integrations (never expose keys to frontend)
simulator.security_3: Rotate API keys regularly via API Keys dashboard
simulator.security_4: Use HTTPS only for all API requests
simulator.security_6: Log and monitor API responses for errors
simulator.performance_excellent: Excellent response time! Your integration is optimized.
simulator.performance_good: Good response time, but there may be room for optimization.
simulator.performance_slow: Slower than expected. Check your network and API configuration.
